text: Lucy Fox (1897–1970) was an American actress active in the era of silent film.Solomon, p. 290 ==Selected filmography== * Just for Tonight (1918) * Why I Would Not Marry? (1918) * The Bishop's Emeralds (1919) * The Winchester Woman (1919) * Something Different (1920) * Hurricane Hutch (1921) * The Money Maniac (1921) * My Old Kentucky Home (1922) * Sonny (1922) * Speed (1922) * Teeth (1924) * The Trail Rider (1925) * The Arizona Romeo (1925) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography. McFarland, 2011. ==External links== * Category:1897 births Category:1970 deaths Category:American film actresses Category:People from New York City Category:20th-century American actresses
title: Lucy Fox
